Reviews: Poor quality microphone. Not suitable for a remote worker taking calls. If your job requires dictation or a high quality mic, go elsewhere

These are the best pair of wireless earphones I ever came across, apple has definitely done it again. Being an apple fan, I love these! They are so easy to connect! Once I connected them to my iPhone, they were seamlessly connected to my other apple devices. All I have to do is select them in the list from the device you need them to connect and you are good to go. Another good thing is turning them on/off is easy, just remove them from the charging case and they turn on and put them back to turn them off, its simple. And like most of the earphones out there, they connect to the last device you used them with, but its easy to switch device. You have the flexibility to just use one piece, if you like and sometimes it does come handy. Another function I like is the automatic ear detection, just remove a piece from you ear and playback will pause and resume once you put it back, this does help when someone drops by for a conversation and you don't need to actually pickup your phone to pause the playback. The battery life is definitely impressive, I need to charge the case every 2 days. And it's easy to carry everywhere, it being so small. Now the sound quality is crisp and connection is smooth, I found that the 2nd gen AirPods are actually better and improved on 1st gen, but its not worth to upgrade, but if you are planning to get your first one, I would definitely say go for the 2nd gen AirPods, I got a pretty sweet deal on amazon and am very happy with my purchase.
Nouns: pair of earphones, battery life, sound quality, connectino, deal
Adjectives: best, definitely impressive, crisp, smooth, pretty sweet

Reviews: Okay, so I bought these after my third pair of cheaper wireless headphones broke. I was getting tired of ones that attached and had the cord that went around my neck. Hence, I decided to search the internet for the best headphones that would work for listening to music/audio books while working out or doing things around the house. I finally decided to try out the AirPods since they had such great reviews, and because they were on sale. When I received the AirPods, I was surprised at how well they actually fit in my ears. I had worried about them falling out, and though they have fallen out a few times due to my children rough housing and landing on my head, they have worked great for walking around the house and exercising. The sound quality is really amazing, and I am pleasantly surprised at how quickly they charge. I will update this once I've had them longer than a few weeks, but I am extremely impressed with them so far. I was extremely skeptical at first, but I'm very glad I decided to get them!

Good sound, though I‚Äôm 63 and not an audiophile. But you can‚Äôt beat them for convenience. Great for walking due to Siri based controls. Siri also let‚Äôs me look unfamiliar words while listening to audiobooks, which I love. Only earbuds I‚Äôve ever found that stay in my ears, yet so light and comfortable that I forget I have them in. Not exactly a fashion statement in my opinion. I joke that, with the white protuberances going down out of the years of an older guy, it looks like his hearing aids are melting. But yeah, very very good and reliable product, pairs perfectly every time with no dropped signal, really excellently designed all the way around.
Adjectives: good, light and comfortable, very very good and reliable, excellently

Reviews: I'm not really sure how helpful a review is at this point. Everyone who's going to buy AirPods already knows that they like them or not. Apple is releasing some AirPods with noise cancellation, I think that's the biggest complaint most people have: that they don't feel like they're deafened to the world around them. But everytime someone comes into my office I have to stop the music or take the AirPods completely out of my ears to hear them clearly. The sound quality is decent. I'm no audiophile so to me they sound great. They also are easy to lose, but so are any other tiny cordless in-ear earphones. Just keep track of them and you should be good to go. At first they hurt my ears so I bought some silicone covers with wingtips. They helped the AirPods stay in my ears without moving around and "softened" the edges of the earphones. I guess they stretched my ears out or I just got used to wearing them, because now even without the silicone covers they fit and feel just fine. The battery life is pretty good, and popping them back in the case for 10-15 minutes boosts them almost back up to full. So I'll wear them at work and then if I get up to grab a drink or use the bathroom I'll give the AirPods a quick charge and be good to go the rest of the day. At first double-tapping to get them to pause or skip a song was frustrating but there's a tutorial online somewhere that shows you where to tap to get consistent results: just above the neck of the AirPods. They pair immediately with your iPhone and I've never had any connectivity issues or sound quality issues, so I'm very happy with my purchase.

Given Apple‚Äôs price-quality continuum history, I had high expectations for this pricey set of earbuds. Out of the box and after fully charging, I was amazed at how fast they paired with my iPhone7. I have about 20 sets of earphones, ranging in price from the cheapo Monoprice to the Bose Sportsound. So, I put them in my ear canals and headed out for my 3-mile loop. I had expressed doubt that they would remain seated in my external auditory meatus while running. I had not gone 100m and the left one popped out and hit the pavement. This happened three more times before I was done. The right channel never moved. The sound quality was excellent. Not so great for excluding the ambient sound of passing cars. So, bottom line: great packaging. Long play life. Excellent sound in environments where ambient noise is around 80dB. If your ears are like mine, you‚Äôll likely be picking one of them off the ground. The touch feature is great for taking phone calls. But, the Bose wins hands down for fit and exclusion of background noise. Plus, you have a fail-safe wire connecting both buds, a comforting thought when riding a bike. Who wants to retrieve a lost earbud when cranking along at 20mph?
Nouns: paired, sound quality, packaging, play life, sound, touch feature
Adjectives: fast, excellent, great, long, excellent, great

Reviews: I know I‚Äôve tried every wireless headphone there is on the market! I could not talk on the phone clearly with any of them! I was about to give up when the guy at the nail salon told me about these! At this point I‚Äôd spent so much on the cheap ones that I decided to ‚Äúinvest‚Äù in these! I‚Äôm SOOOOO happy with them and they‚Äôre well worth the investment! The people on the other end of my phone say they can hear me better than speaker and the Bluetooth in my car! After I raved about them constantly to my family they have all bought a pair! Even my mother in law bought a pair. Now, we‚Äôre all picking out our waterproof and AirPod cases!

I actually really like airpods but this is totally unacceptable quality control. It seems every time I go to use them I have to re-pair them with my phone because the left airpod is not working for whatever reason. Today upon trying to fix them I am now receiving a red exclamation mark, even after re-pairing and re-setting several times and checking the bottom of the pod and the case for debris or damage.

Update: I've had these for six months and the case has stopped charging. They are essentially useless now. I would recommend purchasing through Apple so you can get another pair if yours malfunctions. Since I purchased on here and the return window is closed, I cannot get another pair, which means $130 down the drain. This was definitely one of my best Amazon purchases. The sound quality on these is amazing even during phone calls. The charging case holds an impressive amount of charge so I only need to recharge it once every 2-3 days, which isn't very much considering I use these 8-10 hours a day.at work. That being said, there are some cons to these. The battery life of the AirPods themselves isn't the best-- you'll get 1-2 hours max. Now, five minutes in the charging case will get these back to full charge, so take that with a grain of salt. The biggest con for me has been the Bluetooth connectivity. I have an IPhone 11 so I would expect these to have no issues with connecting. However, every few times I use these, one or both of the AirPods does not connect when I pull it out of the case. It usually takes about five minutes to figure out the problem and re-connect them. It's definitely a problem when I'm trying to pick up a call on my AirPods or listen to something quickly. For that reason, I'd give these 4/5 stars. They're still worth the purchase but I'd recommend adding AppleCare so you can get a replacement if you have the same issues. (P.S. If you have an Apple watch, these do not connect independently to the Apple Watch, you will need to have your IPhone on you.)

These airpods are not any good. First, they DO NOT hold a charge that long. The sound quality is terrible, If you have one in and the 2nd one near by, it's constantly switching automatically. Unable to hear out of both airpods at the same time either talking or listening to music. While on a call, you have to damn near scream so that the other person can hear you. I'm not pleased at all with these airpods. Lastly, one of the airpods just stopped working. So, this was a bust purchase...

I was hesitant to purchase airpods as they were a joke for a while that only rich people had them. But, after going through many cheap pairs of fully wireless earbuds I decided to bite the bullet and purchase airpods. Best decision I have ever made when it comes to my mobile audio. Airpods deliver great sound quality and fit surprisingly well in many different ear types. If you have an iPhone, these are the only earbuds you should even be considering getting with built-in optimization in iOS.

They sound like the apple wired EarPods. They just have more clarity and a little more bass. The whole setup process was so simple and it took about 10 seconds. The battery life is the perfect amount for me and they are comfortable in my ear after hours of listening. Touch controls are also very useful. A lot of reviews have been saying these are fake, but they are 100% real. They are being sold from Apple. The only way they could be fake is if you bought them from a third party seller which the other buyers probably did. This is definitely the best place to buy them, because of how good the price is.
Nouns: setup process, battery life, touch controls

Reviews:
The airpods 2 inherit the first generation design, and the appearance is almost the same as the old model. Same color, same material. But this time, apple put difference in the details.
 1. Long battery life. It can last for 24 hours with fully charged. And the new charging box improves the charging efficiency of the headset. 15 mins box' charging can get up to 3 hours of listening and 2 hours of talking. It is 1 hour longer than the first generation airpods.
 2. Faster connection speed. After adding the H1 chip,there is a big increase in connection speed when pairing devices. When pairing and devices switching, airpods 2 will respond twice as fast as the old model. It is easy to feel that.
 The airpods 2 remain the best wireless earbuds on the market.

I didn't originally want to spend the extra money for airpods, and had some other brand wireless bluetooth headphones. Those worked fine (until they stopped charging for no reason), but the airpods really do work so much better, especially if you have an iphone. Connecting them to the iphone takes seconds, you just hold the case next to your phone and open it. The sound quality is great. The automatic pausing when you take out one airpod is a great feature, and they have a pretty long range - I can leave my phone downstairs and still be connected. The battery life isn't the longest but they charge super quick so it's not a big deal. They're also really comfortable, I have weirdly small ears and I can wear these for hours without any pain or irritation.
Nouns: sound quality, range, battery life, charge
Adjectives: great, pretty long, isn't the longest, super quick

Reviews: Baught as a gift, they loved it the sound is awesome and, the feature that pauses music when you take out of üëÇ s is pretty nifty as well.

Was torn between this one and the Pro model but I‚Äôm glad I went with the regular AirPods 2. They are super comfy and sound quality is plenty good for my liking. Battery life is superb and I use it everyday. I don‚Äôt have any complaints. Only con I can think of is that the case can attract all kinds of lint and other things when they are in your pants pockets all day. No biggie tho. Love mine!

The microphone is TERRIBLE. On video call meetings I get complaints that the audio is fuzzy when I talk and that I sound like a robot. Keep in mind these are paired to a brand new 2019 Apple MacBook Pro, so there should be no issues, yet there are. If these can't work with a product that the SAME manufacturer produces I can only imagine how bad they are if you're on PC.

Absolutely horrible experience with both the product and the shipping. For starters, I pay for prime membership, and didn‚Äôt get the package until around two weeks after I reported that my original package never arrived. Now my AirPod case won‚Äôt charge my AirPods after less than one year of owning it! I always took care of the case, bought a protector for it, only ever used compressed air to clean it, and always clipped it into my waist. There is absolutely zero reason that it should have stopped working. Save yourself the time and don‚Äôt buy the product, it‚Äôs a dud. They‚Äôre sucking your money out of your wallet and giving horrible quality in return. Now my AirPods are useless and they‚Äôll charge $70 just for another dud of an AirPods case.

I love these air pods. Price finally came down from the original price when they first came out so I went for them. The last pair of head phones I owned was back when the wired version was around so it‚Äôs been a few years. These sounds great.. love having no wires. They stay in my ears no problem. I didn‚Äôt want noise cancelling headphones so these are perfect. I like them especially at the gym hearing what‚Äôs going on around me. I feel almost unsafe with noise canceling headphones.. battery life is great. I highly recommend buying these

This is definitely worth your money. If your deciding to buy AirPods or not, you definitely should. The sound quality is outstanding and the noise cancellation is a 3 star. And that‚Äôs good because you can listen to your music and still hear what‚Äôs going on around you in case of emergencies or something like that. But the one thing that outstands me the most is the battery life. You could go on a camping trip for a week with your AirPods case at 100% and by the time you get home they would be at 50% I am so amazed with the battery life. This is a 5 star product

They sound great for the prices. I definitely recommend them. They‚Äôre perfect for working out and working. The sound quality is great. The only dislike I have is the sound cancelling. Other then that this is an amazing product.

These were great for 5-3/4 months. Then the charging got wonky. Suddenly, after leaving the airpods charging overnight, one or the other airpod would give me a low battery warning 5 minutes after removing them from the case. Then the next charge would be fine. Repeat whole process. Very disappointed in this product. Because of COVID, I can't take them into the local Apple Store. Instead, I get a $220 hold on my credit card, and wait for a refurb unit. I should have the hold removed once they get my defective unit back. I won't buy these again. If you do buy them, I strongly recommend the AppleCare (which you must buy within the first 60 days of placing your order.)

I had to purchase these after my previous cord ear buds went out. Was reluctant because of the price. But they are proving to be worth every penny! The sound quality is amazing. If I get a phone call, even when outside and I have these in I can hear the caller very clearly and have been told my voice is very clear coming through. Highly recommend these!

Great airpods! Low latency, good sound quality. Please put in the dissription that these are GENERATION 2 Airpods so people won't get confused to whether they are getting gen 1 or gen 2 airpods. I had to look up my serial number on the apple site to make sure, and these are generation 2 airpods! not generation 1. So this is truly the latest model! And please don't get confused, these are not Pros, but the latest non pro model (generation 2).

If I hadn't authenticated the serial number, I'd seriously think I was sold a counterfeit product. Since this is an authentic, new product, I'm just left to believe the product is mediocre at best.
 
 I regularly use my air pods on both iOS and Android devices. The air pods connect relatively quickly and easily to both, but especially with other Apple devices. (For some reason, the max volume is significantly lower on my Android device.) The Bluetooth range is not great with reception starting to break up if you move more than 4-5' away from the phone. The sound is pretty clear, but less than 10 weeks after purchase, individual ear buds will cut in and out or get static-y even while sitting stationary next to my phone. Like other reviewers, my individual ear buds don't seem to charge evenly with one often dying well before the second. I've also been disappointed with the battery performance. The ear buds re-charge quickly when inserted into the case and I'd say I can probably get 5 hours of run time between charges of the *case*, but I struggle to regularly get more than 2 hours of run time per full charge of the ear buds (and oftentimes not even that). Finally, I have no idea how people wear these all the time as I found the shape of the air pods to be tremendously uncomfortable. (Though I am aware accessories exist to mitigate this issue)
 
 I truly don't understand the effuse praise heaped upon air pods. I am deeply underwhelmed.
Nouns: product, product, product, connect, connect, max volume, bluetooth range, sound, recharge
Adjectives: authentic, new, mediocre, relatively quickly, easily, significantly lower, not great, pretty clear, quickly

Reviews: After owning a pair of AirPods myself for a long while I bought two pairs for my teens. They BOTH love them! Super easy to use and the great quality that you would expect from Apple. My kids are so happy they no longer have to worry about the cords. Sound quality is fabulous and they stay in their ears when they workout. I thought about buying the cheaper brand until I heard of how they stop working so I'm glad that I went ahead and bought quality... it shows. I bought silicon covers for the cases with clips as well. Super fast delivery!!!!

These air pods have surprisingly good battery life and are really comfortable to wear. I primarily use my air pods during work. So probably 5-8 hours a work day. I use them intermittently due to having to interact with my coworkers. I charge them every time I have to give someone my attention. As a result of that I've never ran out of battery life in a single day. I also find them extremely comfortable, like I forget they are even there sometimes if I paused my audiobook. While I don't exercise with them, I haven't had one fall out yet during regular use. But I am cautious enough to not use them around water as I fear they might fall out and be damaged in such circumstances.
 
 Unfortunately, we are only allowed one earbud in while we work. Some areas of my workspace are loud due primarily to large AC units and conveyors converging in certain areas. Due to this, I do have one complaint about them. They don't cancel noise very well. I used to have another pair of wireless ear buds and they were much better at cancelling out sound, even with one ear free. As a result I am frequently having to pause my audiobook in these areas as I don't want to blow out one of my eardrums trying to overpower the external sounds with raising the volume of my device.
 
 As to regards about sound quality, I find them good for my purposes. Listening to podcasts and audiobooks in standard quality. I have decent headphones at home if I want an audiophile experience with high quality audio formats especially with music, games, and shows. But the air pods don't necessarily sound terrible. They are just a little annoying to pair between my iphone and pc back and forth. (Not a fan of Macs, sorry apple crowd)
 
 As I only use them while I work, I don't take calls, so I can't comment on the sound receiving end of the earbuds and their use as a headset.
 
 Overall I think they are pretty great product. I did receive the newest model, it was factory sealed and did not appear to have been used. I read a couple of bad reviews and I was particularly worried about receiving a previous model or returned item sold as new. Thankfully everything was fine.
Remarks: Detailed and meaningful review but few noun-adj pairs

Reviews: Super Convenient. Couldn‚Äôt be easier to set up! Charged fast. Impressive battery life. Loved the automatic pause sensor feature when 1 or both AirPods are removed from one‚Äôs ear.
Remarks: very positive description does not match the neutral rating

Reviews: I use mine, almost exclusively for calls. I tried the several knock offs, waist of time! These work amazing for talking, noise cancelling is excellent, quick connection, pairing is flawless, good range, voice quality is best around for both parties. If you like the fit of ear buds that come with your phone & you don't want a cord, this is the only choice. Only negative & it is relatively minor, battery life is a bit short. The case holds a numerous charges, but you do have to put them back in the case when ever you get a chance to keep them charged. All in all, pretty minor issue. IF you like your iPhone & fit of the corded headphones that came w/your phone, buy these.Fantastic sound quality and the easiest blue tooth connection I have ever experienced. In addition they are almost bullet proof. I have left them in my shirt pocket and they have gone through the washing machine and dryer and still work with no degradation. I wouldn't advise the Washing machine but I can attest they still work after
Nouns: noise cancelling, connection, pairing, range, voice quality, battery life, sound quality, blue tooth connection
Adjectives: excellent, quick, flawless, good, best around, a bit short, fantastic, easiest

Reviews: I bought this item in prime day just to have the AirPods a bluetooth handsfree with high quality sound and easy to use. But I'm not satisfied with the battery life at all. If I talk on a phone for an hour and watch a movie for another hour the battery dies and I should recharge it using its case. So the battery life for my item is less than a few hours if I use it constantly. It seems expensive for this battery quality.
Remarks: negative description does not match the neutral rating
